short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An enhanced version of the default Ctrl+F.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better Ctrl+F is a Chrome extension that is an enhanced version of the default Ctrl+F, providing a more flexible search experience within web pages.

Key Features:

- Multi-term Search: Simultaneously search for up to 5 different terms
- Custom Highlighting: Personalize colors for each search term and focused result
- Advanced Search Options: Toggle case-sensitive and diacritics-sensitive searches
- Efficient Navigation: Quickly move through search results using intuitive controls
- Theme Options: Choose between light and dark mode for your preference
- Persistent Settings: Your preferences are saved across browser sessions

GitHub repository: https://github.com/takumitoma/better-ctrl-f

If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvement, please submit them through the GitHub Issues page. Your feedback is appreciated!
